description: Are you ready to receive many compliments on your Customized Baseball necklace? We offer variety of styles. Customized Baseball batter, Baseball catcher, Baseball pitcher, Baseball mom, Baseball ball name and number and Baseball number. These personalized name and number Baseball necklaces will make a unique accessory to wear on game days to show your support. The pendants can be personalized with any name and number. Baseball fans in all genders and age groups love wearing these Baseball necklaces to show their team pride. Men, women, girls, boys, youth and kids fall in love with these Baseball pendants necklace and jewelry. This necklace will make the perfect gift for any Baseball player, Baseball fan, Baseball mom, and Baseball Teams and Coaches. We offer a quantity discount of 20% if you purchase 10 or more. Discount will be applied automatically. These necklaces are about 18" and can be extended to 20” with the 2” extension chain. They are made out of durable and long lasting ceramic and metal beads. The beads on these necklaces are virtually indestructible. These pendants are truly beautiful and very popular. Take a look at our Amazon shop and you will find all the great reviews from our wonderful customers.
